Title: Claimed
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (series of graphic novels), Tony Moore (series of graphic novels), Charlie Adlard (series of graphic novels), Nichole Beattie, Seth Hoffman
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Steven Yeun, Lauren Cohan
Plot: While Carl and Michonne look for supplies, Rick is faced against a gang of marauders. Meanwhile, Glenn and Tara are brought together with three strangers on an important mission.
